questions.question: What does Phoebe say she was thinking of getting as a gift for Frank and Alice?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I was thinking of like a gravy boat.'

questions.question: Why did Frank and Alice go to the courthouse?
questions.explanation: Frank says 'We were having lunch. Yeah and then all of the sudden we were like, "Hey! Y'know, we’re here, having lunch let’s get married!'

questions.question: What is the main reason Frank and Alice want Phoebe to be a surrogate?
options: Because they want a designer baby
Because they want to experience pregnancy
questions.explanation: Alice says 'We’ve been trying to get pregnant, uh pretty much ever since we got engaged, we thought we’d get a jump on things, y’know no one’s getting any younger.'

questions.question: What job did Joey get at the museum?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Oh, ah, tour guide at the museum. Yeah, Ross got it for me.'

questions.question: Why does Ross correct Joey about the time period of the Tyrannosaurus Rex?
options: Because Joey said it was from the Triassic period
Because Joey said it was from the Jurassic period
Because Joey said it was from the Cretaceous period
Because Joey said it was from the Pliocene Epic
questions.correct_answer: Because Joey said it was from the Jurassic period
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Uh actually Joey, it’s the Cretaceous period.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe's mom do as a hobby?
questions.explanation: Phoebe's mom says 'Well, yeah, mostly nudes. It combines my two passions, pottery and erotica.'

questions.question: Why does Chandler lie about why he hasn't had sex with Kathy yet?
options: Because he's not attracted to her
Because he's waiting for the right moment
Because he's afraid he won't be as good as her previous boyfriend
questions.correct_answer: Because he's afraid he won't be as good as her previous boyfriend
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Well, Kathy’s last boyfriend was Joey. And I’m afraid I won’t be able to make love as well as him.'

questions.question: What does Monica draw to help Chandler understand how to please a woman?
options: A diagram of the human body
A picture of a woman's face
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones.' and starts labeling them

questions.question: Why does Ross decide to sit with Joey in the museum cafeteria?
options: Because he wants to show off his new white coat
Because he wants to impress the tour guides
Because he wants to break down the division between scientists and tour guides
Because he wants to get away from the other scientists
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants to break down the division between scientists and tour guides
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I look around this cafeteria, and y’know what I see, I see-I see division. Division, between people in white coats and people in blue blazers, and I ask myself, "My God why?!"'

questions.question: What is the name of the puppy Phoebe gives to Frank and Alice?
questions.explanation: The puppy is not given a specific name in the conversation

questions.question: Why does Phoebe decide to carry Frank and Alice's baby?
options: Because she wants to experience pregnancy
Because she wants to help her brother
Because she gave them the puppy and it made them happy
Because she feels sorry for them
questions.correct_answer: Because she gave them the puppy and it made them happy
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I gave them the puppy and it made them so happy that I decided I’m gonna carry their baby.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe's mom realize she did wrong?
options: She didn't give Phoebe the puppy
She gave Phoebe advice about being a surrogate
She didn't give Phoebe advice about being a surrogate
questions.explanation: Phoebe's mom says 'But Phoebe... it’s just—that was my puppy.'

questions.question: What does Monica ask Rachel if she would do for her?
questions.explanation: Monica asks 'Would you ever be a surrogate for anyone?' and then 'What if I asked?'

questions.question: What is the reaction of the people in Central Perk when Phoebe tells them she's going to be a surrogate?
options: They are all shocked and disappointed
They are all happy and supportive
They are all confused and unsure
They are all angry and upset
questions.correct_answer: They are all happy and supportive
questions.explanation: The scene shows a positive and supportive reaction from the people in Central Perk

questions.question: What is the reason for the division between the scientists and tour guides in the museum?
questions.explanation: The tour guide says 'That’s just the way it is.' and 'You’re not in a perfect world, you’re in a museum now.'

questions.question: What does Joey say to Ross when he finds out that Ross won't sit with him in the cafeteria?
options: I'm hurt that you won't sit with me
I understand, it's no big deal
I'm angry that you won't sit with me
I'm disappointed that you won't sit with me
questions.correct_answer: I understand, it's no big deal
questions.explanation: Joey says 'It’s no big deal. Hey, y’know, you do what you gotta do. Right?'

questions.question: What does Phoebe's mom give her as a gift?
questions.explanation: Phoebe's mom says 'The-the puppy’s yours.'

questions.question: Why does Phoebe visit her mom?
options: To talk about being a surrogate
To ask for advice on her career
To introduce her mom to her friends
questions.correct_answer: To talk about being a surrogate
questions.explanation: Phoebe's mom says 'I just-I just thought it would be a very good idea to talk about this baby stuff in person.'

questions.question: What does Chandler learn from Monica about pleasing a woman?
options: That there are seven erogenous zones
That the key is to be romantic
That the key is to be spontaneous
That the key is to be patient
questions.correct_answer: That there are seven erogenous zones
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones.' and labels them

questions.question: What does Ross do to break down the division between scientists and tour guides?
options: He sits with the tour guides
questions.correct_answer: He sits with the tour guides
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I’m having my lunch at this table, here in the middle. I’m having lunch right here, with my good friend Joey, if he’ll sit with me.'
